clock_set 2000-10-01T03:11:22Z

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=2;user-id=7;testing-admin=1 :admin!admin@admin.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #hortbot :!admin exec The current time is (_TIME_).
send hortbot #hortbot [HB] The current time is 3:11 AM.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=2;user-id=7;testing-admin=1 :admin!admin@admin.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #hortbot :!admin exec (_TESTING_ERROR_).
no_send
